value.string:
portal = context.getPortalObject()
 active_process = portal.restrictedTraverse(active_process_path)
 listbox = portal.restrictedTraverse(listbox_path)
 portal.changeSkin(skin_name)
 request = container.REQUEST
 request.set('portal_skin', skin_name)
 
 parameter_dict = dict(active_process_path=active_process_path)
 if format:
 parameter_dict['format'] = format
 report_data = listbox.aq_parent(**parameter_dict) # call the form
 context.getPortalObject().portal_skins.changeSkin(None)
 request.set('portal_skin', None)
 
 attachment_name_list = [x[len(' filename='):] for x in (request.RESPONSE.getHeader(
 'content-disposition') or '').split(';')
 if x.startswith(' filename=')]
 if attachment_name_list:
 attachment_name = attachment_name_list[0]
 else:
 attachment_name = context.getTranslatedTitle()
 if attachment_name.startswith('"'):
 attachment_name = attachment_name[1:]
 if attachment_name.endswith('"'):
 attachment_name = attachment_name[:-1]
 
 attachment_list = (
 {'mime_type': (request.RESPONSE.getHeader('content-type') or 'application/octet-stream;').split(';')[0],
 'content': '%s' % report_data,
 'name': attachment_name},)
 
 return getattr(context, transport_method_id)(attachment_list, user_name)
listbox_path, active_process_path, skin_name, transport_method_id, user_name, format
